title: Create ProGuard Rules
description: Write ProGuard rules for a Flutter app using Firebase and Retrofit.
instructions: Create a proguard-rules.pro file that: 1) Keeps all Flutter framework classes, 2) Keeps Firebase and Google Play Services classes, 3) Keeps model classes in com.example.myapp.models package, 4) Preserves attributes needed for Retrofit/Gson JSON parsing.

hints.text: Use -keep class package.** { *; } to keep all classes in a package and its subpackages
Use -keepattributes to preserve metadata needed for reflection
Use -dontwarn to suppress warnings for known-safe missing classes

commonMistakes.consequence: Only matches classes in that exact package, not subpackages
commonMistakes.correction: Use -keep class io.flutter.** { *; } with double asterisks

commonMistakes.consequence: JSON parsing fails because field names are obfuscated
commonMistakes.correction: Keep the entire class with { *; } or use -keepclassmembers for fields
